block.p: The Columbia Gas System Inc. said it had missed an $11 million debt payment.The default brings the total of Columbia's defaults to $50 million since the company said last month that it might seek bankruptcy protection because of its costly long-term gas-purchase contracts. On Monday, the company missed a $14 million debt payment. Earlier yesterday, Columbia Gas, based in Wilmington, Del., said it had made arrangements to pay accrued interest on its interest-bearing notes that are overdue and pay post-maturity interest on its short-term discount notes.
